alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:47PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cochise County through 430 PM MST... At 345 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms in western Cochise County. These storms are moving slowly west. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista, Benson, Whetstone, Huachuca City, St. David, Tombstone, Dragoon, Kartchner Caverns State Park, Fort Huachuca, Pearce-Sunsites, Mescal, Cochise, Charleston, Texas Canyon, Muleshoe Ranch Preserve, Fairbank and Cascabel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 297 and 336. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 331. Route 82 between mile markers 46 and 67. Route 90 between mile markers 290 and 333. Route 92 between mile markers 322 and 323. Route 191 between mile markers 54 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
